Basic Types¶

Basic/fundamental types.

class xrpl_plugin.basic_types.AccountID¶

Bases: pybind11_object

A 160-bit unsigned int that uniquely identifies an account.

from_buffer(self: xrpl_plugin.basic_types.Buffer) → xrpl_plugin.basic_types.AccountID¶

Convert the data in a buffer to an AccountID.

parse_hex(self: xrpl_plugin.basic_types.AccountID, arg0: str) → bool¶

Parse a hex representation of an account.

to_base58(self: xrpl_plugin.basic_types.AccountID) → str¶

Get the base58 representation of the account.

to_buffer(self: xrpl_plugin.basic_types.AccountID) → xrpl_plugin.basic_types.Buffer¶

Convert the AccountID data to a buffer.
